Questions.Question: Which TV show features a group of friends living in New York City?
Questions.Explanation: Friends is a popular sitcom that revolves around the lives of six friends in Manhattan.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the fictional town in the TV show 'Stranger Things'?
Questions.Explanation: Stranger Things is set in the small town of Hawkins, Indiana, where supernatural events occur.

Questions.Question: Which TV show follows the lives of a group of survivors in a post-apocalyptic world?
Questions.Explanation: The Walking Dead is a popular series that depicts the struggles of survivors in a world overrun by zombies.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the fictional high school in the TV show 'Riverdale'?
FalseAnswer: Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry
Questions.Explanation: Riverdale High is the school attended by the main characters in the TV show 'Riverdale'.

Questions.Question: Which TV show is set in the fictional town of Stars Hollow?
Questions.Explanation: Gilmore Girls is a dramedy series that takes place in the charming town of Stars Hollow.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the spaceship in the TV show 'Firefly'?
Questions.Explanation: The spaceship in 'Firefly' is called Serenity, serving as the main setting for the show.

Questions.Question: Which TV show features a group of friends hanging out at a bar called 'MacLaren's'?
Questions.Explanation: How I Met Your Mother revolves around a group of friends who often meet at the bar 'MacLaren's'.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the fictional city in the TV show 'Gotham'?
Questions.Explanation: Gotham is set in the crime-ridden city of Gotham City, home to Batman and other iconic characters.

Questions.Question: Which TV show is set in the fictional town of Pawnee, Indiana?
Questions.Explanation: Parks and Recreation is a comedy series that takes place in the quirky town of Pawnee.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the fictional hospital in the TV show 'Grey's Anatomy'?
Questions.Explanation: Grey's Anatomy is set in the fictional Grey Sloan Memorial Hospital, where the characters work.

Questions.Question: Which TV show is set in the fictional town of Twin Peaks?
Questions.Explanation: Twin Peaks is a mystery drama series that takes place in the eponymous town of Twin Peaks.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the fictional university in the TV show 'Community'?
Questions.Explanation: Community is set in the fictional Greendale Community College, where the characters attend classes.
